2164.subject: VPA
2164.course_title_long: Lovers, Landscapes, and Artistic Legacies: Intro to Art Appreciation
2164.descrlong: Loosely chronological in structure, this introductory course invites students to consider both the basic and the profound, in terms of the relationship between humanity and the visual arts. Examining individual and collaborative art-making, we will explore what we learn about ourselves, as humans, from the material cultures of other centuries, other societies, as well as that of our own.
